sourceMeaningMnemonic: You use your <radical>scooter</radical> when the <radical>omen</radical> comes so that you can <kanji>escape</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Unfortunately, the omen is riding a scooter too, so you're going to have to be crafty to escape this omen properly.
readingMnemonic: You decide to <kanji>escape</kanji> this omen by weaving in and out of the busy streets of <ja><reading>とう</reading>きょう</ja>. By now, you know <ja>とうきょう</ja> like the back of your hand, so you're sure you can escape this way.
readingInfo: Imagine scooting in and out of <ja>とうきょう</ja> traffic, the omen looming ever further back behind you. You're doing it! You're escaping!
